headline: Moody’s Ratings Downgrades Kenvue Inc. (KVUE) Outlook from “Stable” to “Negative”
summary: Third Point Management holds $178,428,250 worth of Kenvue Inc. (NYSE:KVUE) shares, representing 2.34% of its portfolio. The stock is included in our list of Billionaire Dan Loeb’s 10 Stocks with Huge Upside Potential. On October 3, 2025, Moody’s Ratings downgraded Kenvue Inc. (NYSE:KVUE)’s outlook from “Stable” to “Negative.” Moody’s downgrade reflects Kenvue Inc. (NYSE:KVUE)’s ongoing […]
